function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High uncertainty level due to the ongoing crisis","Impact":"Increased risk of business failure and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Developing a business continuity plan and diversifying revenue streams","Technologies":"Business analytics and forecasting tools","People":"Business owners, entrepreneurs, and employees","Owner":"Business owners, management, and government policy makers"},{"Description":"Behavioral changes due to the crisis","Impact":"Disruption of traditional business operations and customer behavior","Mitigation":"Adapting to online sales channels and understanding new customer needs","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms and customer data analysis tools","People":"Business owners, entrepreneurs, and customers","Owner":"Business owners and management"},{"Description":"Pressure on entrepreneurs to deliver solutions and overcome challenges","Impact":"Increased stress and mental health issues among entrepreneurs","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support and stress management resources","Technologies":"Mental health apps and online counseling platforms","People":"Entrepreneurs and business owners","Owner":"Business owners and government policy makers"}]}
